evalwrite.value: DYNAMIK let device = {"ip":"", "port":"", "mac":"", "model_name":"", "name":""}; device.ip = "$Result"; device.port = $DevicePort; JSON.stringify(device);

variables.RemoteName: DYNAMIK_INST_START DYNAMIK let name = "meta Samsung SmartTV"; name = Buffer.from(name); name = name.toString("Base64") DYNAMIK_INST_END

evalwrite.value: DYNAMIK let res; if ($AsyncMessage.event == "ms.channel.connect") {res = $AsyncMessage.data; res.id.length == 36} else {$WebSocketIsConnected}

DYNAMIK let res; if ($AsyncMessage.event == "ed.installedApp.get") {res = $AsyncMessage.data; let NewApps = res.data; let OldApps = $Apps; let sortedApps = OldApps.filter(oldApp => NewApps.some(newApp => newApp.appId === oldApp.appId)).map(oldApp => NewApps.find(newApp => newApp.appId === oldApp.appId));/*console.log('Sorted Apps:', '
', sortedApps);*/ NewApps = sortedApps.concat(NewApps.filter(newApp => !OldApps.find(oldApp => oldApp.appId === newApp.appId)));/*console.log('New Apps:', '
', NewApps);*/ let mergedApps = NewApps.map(newApp => ({...newApp, visible: OldApps.find(oldApp => oldApp.appId === newApp.appId)?.visible ?? true}));console.log('Merged Apps:', '
', mergedApps); res=JSON.stringify(mergedApps)} else {res=JSON.stringify($Apps)}; res;
DYNAMIK let res; if ($AsyncMessage.event == "ed.apps.icon") {res = $AsyncMessage.data; res=res.imageBase64; res=JSON.stringify(res)} else {res = "undefined"}; res;

DYNAMIK const fs = require("fs"); if ($AsyncMessage.event == "ed.apps.icon") {let AppId = ''; let IconPathSplit = $AsyncMessage.data.iconPath.split('/'); if (IconPathSplit[IconPathSplit.length -2]=='LocalIcon') {AppId = IconPathSplit[IconPathSplit.length -1].split('.').slice(0,-1).join('.')} else {AppId = IconPathSplit[IconPathSplit.length -2]}; let AppIterator = $Apps.findIndex(i => i.appId === AppId); let icon = $Base64Icon; let path = "$IconServerRoot/$IconServerDriverFolder/$DeviceIP/"; const buffer = Buffer.from(icon, "base64"); fs.mkdirSync(path, {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync(path + $Apps[Number(AppIterator)].name.replace(/\s/g, "_").replace(/–/g, "-") + ".png", buffer); "Icon saved: #" + Number(AppIterator) + " " + $Apps[Number(AppIterator)].name.replace(/\s/g, "_").replace(/–/g, "-") + ".png"} else {"No Icon saved"}

evaldo.test: DYNAMIK if ($IconServerEnabled == false || $RequestedApps == false) {false} else {let apps = $Apps; let bol = Number($AppIterator) < apps.length; bol}
DYNAMIK if ($IconServerStatus == true || $Apps.length == 0) {false} else {let apps = $Apps; let bol = Number($AppIterator) == apps.length; bol}

__RUNICONSERVER.command: DYNAMIK const path = require('path'); const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const host = '0.0.0.0'; const port = $IconServerPort; const mime = {jpg: 'image/jpeg', png: 'image/png',}; var server = http.createServer((req, res) => {var file = path.join(__dirname, '$IconServerRoot', req.url); var type = mime[path.extname(file).slice(1)] || 'text/plain'; var s = fs.createReadStream(file); s.on('open', () => {res.setHeader('Content-Type', type); s.pipe(res);}); s.on('error', () => {res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/plain'); res.response_code = 404; res.end('Not found');});}); server.listen(port, host, () => {console.log('Icon Server running at http://localhost:'+port);});

commandset.itemlabel: A local http server is created to host the app icons: http://$MetaIP:/$IconServerPort. This option can disable the server. But then no more icons are displayed in the app list!
Set check mark to display or hide apps in the app list.

evalwrite.value: DYNAMIK let Apps = $Apps; let visible = $Apps[$ListIndex-1].visible; Apps[$ListIndex-1].visible=(visible==true?false:true); Apps=JSON.stringify(Apps); Apps;

commandset.itemlabel: This process can be used to rearrage the order of the apps in the app list. The app that is selected first will be at the top.

evalwrite.value: DYNAMIK let RearrangedApps = $RearrangedApps; let ToRerrangeApps = $ToRerrangeApps; if ($RearrangedApps.length == 0) {} else {ToRerrangeApps.unshift(RearrangedApps[RearrangedApps.length-1])}; ToRerrangeApps=JSON.stringify(ToRerrangeApps); ToRerrangeApps;

commandset.command: DYNAMIK if ($RearrangedApps.length == $Apps.filter(i=>i.visible==true).length) {[{"name":"Save the selected order!"}]} else {$ToRerrangeApps}

evalwrite.value: DYNAMIK let Apps = $Apps; if ($RearrangedApps.length == $Apps.filter(i=>i.visible==true).length) {Apps = $RearrangedApps.concat($Apps.filter(newApp => !$RearrangedApps.find(remApp => remApp.appId === newApp.appId)));} else {}; Apps=JSON.stringify(Apps); Apps;
DYNAMIK let ToRerrangeApps = $ToRerrangeApps; let RearrangedApps = $RearrangedApps; RearrangedApps.push(ToRerrangeApps[$ListIndex-1]); RearrangedApps=JSON.stringify(RearrangedApps); RearrangedApps;
